public static class AbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams extends ViewGroup.LayoutParams
Per-child layout information associated with AbsoluteLayout.

  • Field Details

      public int x
      The horizontal, or X, location of the child within the view group.

  • Constructor Details

    • LayoutParams

      public LayoutParams(int width, int height, int x, int y)
      Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and location.
      Parameters:
      width - the width, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
      height - the height, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
      x - the X location of the child
      y - the Y location of the child

    • LayoutParams

      public LayoutParams(@Nonnull ViewGroup.LayoutParams source)

    • LayoutParams

      public LayoutParams(@Nonnull AbsoluteLayout.LayoutParams source)
      Copy constructor. Clones the width, height, x and y of the source.
      Parameters:
      source - The layout params to copy from.
